title: Plat 3 ADC LF DUO
body: Looking for a support to grind out some elo and see how high we can do. I play most of the meta champs and learn new things when they come along

replies.body:
Yoo. I'm currently Plat 4, dropped from P3 twice in a week which is depressing. I'm a bot/mid main (main {{champion:40}}) looking to duo :)

** IGN: Filthy Mac User**
hey man.. im G1 - looking to get into plat xD could be keen to duo~ ign: realskes
